### Mediators

```{r}
m <- read.csv("data/mediators_18812rows_by_cat.csv")
m <- subset(m, padj < 0.05)

top <- data.frame(table(m$id))
top <- top[order(top$Freq, decreasing = T),]

idx <- which(top$Var1 %in% "GRMZM2G171650")


head(m)

subset(m, id %in% "GRMZM2G171650")
```
